body:
Closes #10638.
Fixes #12235.

- If the spack target is a generic (e.g. x86_64), OpenBLAS will now use
  the 'DYNAMIC_ARCH' setting instead of targeting the host architecture
- Translate spack-defined microarchitecture into OpenBLAS TARGET=
  argument
- Removes 'target', 'virtual_machine', 'avx2', 'avx512' variants as they
  are no longer needed
- Adds option to disable build of static libraries
title: Use Spack target architecture to determine OpenBLAS target
